edu.unika.aifb.foam.input
Class ExplicitRelation

java.lang.Object
  edu.unika.aifb.foam.input.ExplicitRelation

public class ExplicitRelation
extends java.lang.Object

Allows to load a mapping file. Explicit mapping relations are added to the result list. User predefined mappings can be inserted into the system. This is also the entry point for user interaction during runtime.

Author:
Marc Ehrig
